response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am offering you the chance to own this item at a special price of $750,000. This is a unique opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a discounted rate, considering its true worth is $800,000. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing the details further with you.", "product_price": 750000}
